text: The America-Israel Cultural Foundation is a non-profit from America that supports Israel. == History == It was first founded in 1939 for the creation of a Jewish state. It was called the American Fund for Palestinian Institutions until 1948 where it was changed to the American Fund for Israeli Institutions. It later changed its name to the America Israel Cultural Foundation which is its current name. ==References== Category:Non-profit organizations Category:Non-governmental organizations
title: America-Israel Cultural Foundation
